articles.author: Lizzie Johnson
articles.title: After ‘good’ Trump meeting, Zelensky pushes Europe hard to do more - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Trump and White House envoy Steve Witkoff have said a deal to resolve nearly four years of war between Russia and Ukraine is close.
articles.content: KYIV Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky aimed a blistering speech at Europe during the World Economic Forum on Thursday after a last-minute meeting with President Donald Trump, which both leaders… [+134 chars]
